sentence: Stepan Company ( SCL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on November 28, 2016.
A cash dividend payment of $0.205 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 15, 2016.
Shareholders who purchased SCL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 7.89% increase over prior dividend payment.
At the current stock price of $79.77, the dividend yield is 1.03%.
The previous trading day's last sale of SCL was $79.77, representing a -1.02% decrease from the 52 week high of $80.59 and a 92.59% increase over the 52 week low of $41.42.
SCL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
SCL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $3.87.
Zacks Investment Research reports SCL's forecasted earnings growth in 2016 as 25.72%, compared to an industry average of 7.1%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the SCL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
